name: Wild Hunt: Idle Clicker
description:
Control the outcome of Devin Tibbs and Rebecca Tibbs in this Idle Clicker. Continuing the Wild Hunt Saga. Devin and Rebecca must try and survive on a barren island. Unlock more islands to explore and defeat animals and savage mythic monsters**.

**Feature Coming Soon.

This game is a work in progress and is being heavily developed. I release multiply patches daily. I'm looking for game testers to test my app and give feedback.  I hope you like my Idle Clicker game and if you would like to see it on Windows as well let me know.

Thanks,

CharlesE
